property.name: xlrServer
property.label: Server
property.description: The XL Release server to connect to.

property.name: username
property.description: Overrides the username used to connect to the server.

property.name: password
property.description: Overrides the password used to connect to the server.

property.name: templateName
property.label: Template Name
property.description: Name of the template from which to create the subrelease.

property.name: releaseTitle
property.label: Release Title
property.description: Name of the newly created subrelease.

property.name: releaseDescription
property.label: Release Description
property.description: Description of the subrelease.

property.name: variables
property.label: variables (deprecated)
property.description: Comma-separated key-value pairs for the values of variables required by the subrelease, e.g. var1=value1,var2=value2

property.name: variableMap
property.label: variables
property.description: Map of variables required by the subrelease, where key is the variable name and value the actual value

property.name: asynch
property.description: If [false], the task will wait for the subrelease to finish.

property.name: gateTaskTitle
property.description: Title of the gate task in this release that should wait for the subrelease to complete. Skipped if not specified (blank).

property.name: templateName
property.label: Template Name
property.description: Name of the template to create.

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma-separated list of tags to associate with this template e.g. tag1,tag2.

property.name: templateId
property.description: The ID of the created template.

property.name: phases
property.label: phases (deprecated)
property.description: Comma-separated list of phases to delete - deprecated.

property.name: phasesToDelete
property.label: phases
property.description: Phases to delete

property.name: taskTitle
property.label: Task Title
property.description: Title of the task to get the id for.

property.name: taskId
property.description: The id of the task.

type.label: XL Release: Wait for Blocking Task

property.name: phaseName
property.label: Phase Name to check for running task

property.name: taskName
property.label: Task Name to verify is not running

type.label: XL Release: Add or Remove Tags

property.name: tagsToRemove
property.description: List of tags to remove from this release

property.name: tagsToAdd
property.description: List of tags to add to this release

type.label: XL Release: Add XL Deploy task

property.name: releaseName
property.label: Release Name
property.description: Name of the release to create the task.

property.name: phaseName
property.label: Phase Name
property.description: Name of the phase to create the task.

property.name: taskTitle
property.label: Task Title
property.description: Title for the teask to be created.

property.name: xldServer
property.label: Server
property.description: XL Deploy server to connect to.

property.name: deploymentPackage
property.label: Package
property.description: Version of the application to be deployed. Auto-complete is supported in this field.

property.name: deploymentEnvironment
property.label: Environment
property.description: Environment to deploy to. Auto-complete is supported in this field.

property.name: rollbackOnFailure
property.label: Rollback on Failure
property.description: Rollback on failure controls whether or not the task is rolled back.

property.name: targetId
property.label: Release ID
property.description: ID of the release for which this task will wait to complete or fail.

property.name: targetStatus
property.label: Release Status
property.description: The status of the target release: one of COMPLETED, FAILED and ABORTED

type.label: XL Release: Wait for Release Status

property.name: targetId
property.label: Release ID
property.description: ID of the release for which status to wait for.

property.name: untilInProgress
property.label: In Progress
property.description: Pass when the release is in progress

property.name: untilPaused
property.label: Paused
property.description: Pass when the release is paused (can happen as part of a phase restart)

property.name: untilFailing
property.label: Failing
property.description: Pass when the release is failing (some tasks failed, some still in progress)

property.name: untilFailed
property.label: Failed
property.description: Pass when the release has failed

property.name: untilCompleted
property.label: Completed
property.description: Pass if the release has completed

property.name: untilAborted
property.label: Aborted
property.description: Pass if the release has been aborted

property.name: targetStatus
property.label: Release Status
property.description: The matched status of the target release
